by RoiFuries; 2024.

No Corro No Grito No Empujo

  • Production Designer
  • Films
    • >

C. Chan,V. Vela, A. Jiménez, and C. Rangel created this short film as a result of the Documentary Production Workshop, conducted in collaboration with MAFI (Mapa Fílmico de un País), aimed at imprinting a personal perspective on the stories through the understanding of the principles of audiovisual language and their application in filming reality.

  • Producer: Cine Bandada.
  • Director: Maria José Ibarra Valdéz.
3
